name: Bates College
accessdate: 2009-07-09   In 2014, the school was voted the number one vegan-friendly small school in the U.S., according to a PETA survey.    Bates earned a "B" grade on the 2009 College Sustainability Report Card; the school earned "A"s in the Administration, Climate Change & Energy, Student Involvement, Food & Recycling, and Green Building categories.
